title: RP purchase 24 hours error
body: I tryed to buy some RP to get some skins while discounts in store, so I forgot thats Online buys is off on my VISA card and then I get the occasional "Exceeded Limit - Wait 24 Hours" message and I oblige with the notification and wait my time, but up until recently I noticed that this window isn't going away. So now as of Oct. 27, 2016, it has been a good 3+ days (including a couple of hours) and since then I have been plagued by this accursed screen and I can't successfully buy anymore RP in-game. So is this just a minor glitch for some people or does the game just not want money any more?..

replies.body:
Make sure you're waiting 24 hours or longer between attempts. Any early attempts will reset the 24 hour timer, for security purposes. 

Give it a bit more time before you try, and if you still encounter this, let me know.
